column4: Hi, is there any way to utilise the extra keys on a multimedia keyboard. Id like to program them to use apps like songbird etc. I have Feisty
you find the 0x89 code of the button, then use gconf-editor to add hotkeys to metacity
certain apps can just be mapped via the gui directly via the keyboard shortcuts preferences
there's one from the term... i forget what it's called :\
